title: 12-Factor AgentOps Pivot v3
description:
Pivot from "Shift-Left Validation for Coding Agents" to "The Operational Discipline for Working With Agents".

Plan: docs/plans/2026-02-15-pivot-design.md (v3)
Pre-mortem: .agents/council/2026-02-15-pre-mortem-v2-pivot-consolidated.md (WARN, proceed)

## Cross-Cutting Constraints

- Content budgets: 400-600 lines per factor, 600 max for Factor I, 800-1000 lines README
- Factor depth: 500+ words minimum per factor (GOALS.yaml enforced)
- Foundation factors (I-III) MUST have "Without Tooling" sections
- Scale factors (X-XII) MUST be marked OPTIONAL/advanced
- No new marketplace skills, no tutorial rewrites, no new tooling
- Olympus mentions: exactly 1 sentence per Scale factor
- All GOALS.yaml checks must pass on completion

title: Archive old factors + create MAPPING.md
description:
Move current factors/ (12 files, 10,360 lines total) to _archived/factors-v1/.
Create _archived/factors-v1/MAPPING.md with columns:
- Old Number, Old Title, New Number, New Title, Content Disposition, Notes

Content dispositions: rewrite, merge, split, new.
Key collision: Old Factor II "Context Loading" (870 lines) → New Factor I "Context Is Everything" (merge).

Acceptance: _archived/factors-v1/ contains all 12 old factor files + MAPPING.md.
factors/ directory is empty (ready for new files).

```validation
{"files_exist": ["_archived/factors-v1/MAPPING.md"], "command": "ls _archived/factors-v1/*.md | grep -v MAPPING | wc -l | grep -q '1[0-2]'"}
```
close_reason: Archived 12 old factors to _archived/factors-v1/ with MAPPING.md

title: Rewrite README
description:
Complete README rewrite. 800-1000 lines. This is product writing, not a quick edit.

Design brief:
- Purpose: Primary entry point. Leads with knowledge compounding, delivers 5-min quickstart.
- Key artifacts: README.md
- Structure (6 sections):
  1. Hero: Knowledge compounding pitch ("your sessions get smarter over time")
  2. 30-second pitch: Pain → solution → proof → hook
  3. 5-minute quickstart: Tier 0 — learnings.md with copy-paste examples, no tooling
  4. The 12 Factors: Overview with tiering (Quickstart → Foundation → Workflow → Knowledge → Scale/Optional)
  5. Go deeper: Links to individual factor files
  6. Reference implementation: AgentOps plugin

MUST contain: "Operational Discipline", knowledge compounding hero, quickstart section, tiering structure, "without tooling"/"no plugin" language.
MUST NOT contain: "Shift-Left Validation", "DevOps for Vibe-Coding"

```validation
{"files_exist": ["README.md"], "content_check": [{"file": "README.md", "pattern": "Operational Discipline"}, {"file": "README.md", "pattern": "(?i)quickstart|getting started"}, {"file": "README.md", "pattern": "(?i)knowledge compound|smarter over time"}], "command": "words=$(wc -w < README.md | tr -d ' '); [ \"$words\" -ge 800 ]"}
```

title: Verify GOALS.yaml checks pass
description:
Run all 14 GOALS.yaml checks and verify they pass. Fix any failures.

GOALS.yaml was updated in v3 plan with substance checks. This is the final verification step.

```validation
{"command": "count=0; total=0; while IFS= read -r check; do total=$((total+1)); if eval \"$check\" >/dev/null 2>&1; then count=$((count+1)); fi; done < <(grep -A20 'check:' GOALS.yaml | grep -v 'check:' | grep -v weight | grep -v description | grep -v id: | grep -v '#' | sed '/^$/d'); [ \"$count\" -eq \"$total\" ]"}
```

title: Rewrite Factor I: Context Is Everything
description:
Complete rewrite of Factor I. Absorbs old Factor II "Context Loading" content (870 lines).

Design brief:
- Purpose: Foundation factor #1. Teaches context management as the #1 operational discipline.
- Key artifacts: factors/01-context-is-everything.md (400-600 lines, cap 600)
- Structure: Rule, Rationale (with observable symptoms, "lost in the middle" research, cognitive load theory), What Good Looks Like, Without Tooling section

Content to migrate from old Factor II: 40% rule, observable symptoms, cognitive load research backing, "lost in the middle" references.
Content to archive (NOT migrate): sub-agent architecture deep-dive, HumanLayer attribution section.

Acceptance: File exists, 500+ words, has Rule/What Good Looks Like/Without Tooling sections, mentions observable symptoms.

```validation
{"files_exist": ["factors/01-context-is-everything.md"], "content_check": [{"file": "factors/01-context-is-everything.md", "pattern": "Rule:"}, {"file": "factors/01-context-is-everything.md", "pattern": "(?i)without tooling"}, {"file": "factors/01-context-is-everything.md", "pattern": "(?i)symptom|repeats itself|confabulat"}]}
```

title: Rewrite Factor VIII: Compound Knowledge
description:
Complete rewrite. 400-600 lines. THE HERO FACTOR — unique differentiator.

Design brief:
- Purpose: Knowledge factor #2. Automated flywheel: extract → gate → decay → inject. THE competitive moat.
- Key artifacts: factors/08-compound-knowledge.md
- Structure: Rule, Rationale (with flywheel pattern, compounding equation, observable symptoms), What Good Looks Like
- MUST contain: flywheel pattern, compounding equation (retrieval rate × citation rate > decay rate), observable symptoms

title: Epic: 12-Factor AgentOps v2.0 - ai-platform Learnings Integration
close_reason: Epic kickoff complete - all child issues created and ready for implementation

title: Add IC Deployment Profiles to Factor XII (Package Patterns)
description: Add 3-tier IC model: Tier 1 Disconnected Edge, Tier 2 Internal Datacenter, Tier 3 Connected. Include air-gap deployment checklist, classification boundary patterns. Sanitize specifics.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: 3-Tier IC Deployment, Air-Gap Playbook, Classification Boundaries, Multi-Tenancy, 86-Template Helm Chart

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor III (Focused Agents)
description: Add patterns from ai-platform: Event-Driven Activation (webhook/API/chat/cron taxonomy), Webhook-First Orchestrator-Last, KAgent CRD example (sanitized), Agent decision tree. Include anti-patterns.
close_reason: Completed: Added Implementation Patterns section (280 lines) covering Event-Driven Activation, Webhook-First architecture, Agent Decision Tree, KAgent CRD examples, and production Anti-Patterns. All validated from ai-platform deployment.

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor VII (Smart Routing)
description: Add coordination patterns: Composable Not Chainable, Blackboard coordination (Fractal), Shard/ShardRun model (intent != execution), N+1 worker pattern (Houston). Include anti-pattern: hard-coded chains.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: Composable/Blackboard, SharedInformer, Classification-Aware Routing, Multi-Tier Model Routing

title: Add Implementation Patterns to Factor XI (Fail-Safe Checks)
description: Add self-healing patterns: Reconciliation loops (level-triggered > edge-triggered), Fail-closed defaults, Self-healing architecture, ToolCall audit trail (every action is a CRD). Include Fractal patterns.
close_reason: Added Implementation Patterns: Reconciliation Loops, Fail-Closed Defaults, Circuit Breaker, Spiral Detection

title: Create 'From Theory to Production' document
description: Bridge philosophy to production: docs/explanation/from-theory-to-production.md. Covers evolution story, three layers (Philosophy/Architecture/Implementation), constraint-first differentiation, Kelsey positioning, Houston/Fractal heritage. Links to each factor.
close_reason: Completed: Created from-theory-to-production.md document (490 lines). Bridges philosophy to production with evolution story, three-layer architecture, constraint-first methodology, Kelsey positioning, and Houston/Fractal heritage. Updated docs/README.md.
